name: Quest of Union
description:
Disclaimer: PLEASE PRESS THE BLUE FULLSCREEN BUTTON FOR A CORRECT EXPERIENCE!!!

Apparently a lot of people wanted instructions here, so here you go:

HOW TO PLAY: PRESS E TO INTERACT WITH NPCS WHILE STANDING NEXT TO THEM

PRESS G TO BRING UP YOUR WEAPONS. THEN PRESS LEFT MOUSE CLICK TO ATTACK WITH YOUR SWORD OR PRESS RIGHT MOUSE CLICK TO SHOOT AN ARROW. BOTH WILL BE IN THE DIRECTION OF THE MOUSE.

USE WASD OR THE ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
